name: Homesick (itch) (Cantarim Studios)
description:
This is a co-op platformer about two pigeons, Cru and Pru, that can only be experience by 2 players. 

Recommended for all ages! 

It's a pre-alpha release, so expect to see a proof of concept. 

All assets and code were developed at the jam. 

- CONTROLS - 

You should be able to use 2 separate Xbox or PS controllers, but if for some reason you play using a keyboard, here's the layout: 

Player 1 - WASD + Spacebar 

Player 2 - Arrows + RShift
